From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>

Date: 2025-02-20 13:23
Subject: Our Lights, The Deal Staff Sale, Faces Egypt, Tanagra x Bisou, SGII x JV Management Sports Day, Internal Job Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Get ready for our Lights

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=328&user=10620> 	
As we begin Our Lights this year, we count on our leaders to share your exceptional customer experience stories. They will be sharing on the “Our Lights” space <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=329&user=10620> , so be sure to hit “follow” to see your stories.

You have raised the bar in the previous years and we can’t wait to see how you will go above and beyond this Ramadan.
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

the deal staff sale

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/454a1f15fdda1e29ff4512d9979428bc982603795.jpg> 	

Save up to 90% on your favorite brands at D3, Building 9, R06 Showroom, from February 25th to 28th

the deal staff sale

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/454a1f15fdda1e29ff4512d9979428bc982603795.jpg> 	

Save up to 90% on your favorite brands at D3, Building 9, R06 Showroom, from February 25th to 28th

Dates & Timings:
25th & 26th February: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM
27th & 28th February: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Faces Egypt Grand Re-Opening

Faces Egypt re-opened its flagship store at Cairo Festival City Mall last week, welcoming their VIP customers, top bloggers, and influencers to celebrate in a Valentine’s-themed extravaganza filled with exciting activations, fun give-aways, delicious bites, and refreshing beverages by Lazy Lady. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=330&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=330&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-4-min.png> 	

TANAGRA X BISOU

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=331&user=10620> 	
Visit Bisou, a restaurant which tells the romantic tale of a French librarian and an Arabic poet, located in Dubai Opera Plaza. The love-inspired fusion of flavors and culture will be enjoyed with a mocktail experience. Bisou will host two specially curated mocktails, served in Tanagra glassware until tomorrow 21 February.
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-2-min.png> 	

SGII & JV Management Sports Day
